com.jde.model.physics

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.physics.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This Vertex class implements a 2D vertex
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      X-axis coordinate
      protected double y
      Y-axis coordinate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex()
      Basic constructor, returns the origin vertex: [0, 0]
      Vertex(double x, double y)
      Parametric constructor, returns the vertex [x, y]
      Vertex(Vertex start, Vertex end)
      Point-to-point vertex constructor, returns the vertex that goes from "start" to "end"

      Rotates the calling vertex the given angle
      double scalar(Vertex v) 
      Vertex scale(double s)
      Scales the vector (for ex. scale(3) of [2,2] results in [6,6])
      void setX(double x)
      Sets a new value for the X-axis coordinate
      void setY(double y)
      Sets a new value for the Y-axis coordinate

        Basic constructor, returns the origin vertex: [0, 0]

        x - X-axis coordinate
        y - Y-axis coordinate

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(Vertex start,
      Vertex end)
        Point-to-point vertex constructor, returns the vertex that goes from "start" to "end"
        Parameters:
        start - Origin vertex point
        end - Destination vertex point

    • Method Detail

      • angleToVertex

        public static Vertex angleToVertex(double a)
        Parameters:
        a - Angle in radians
        Returns:
        A unit vector rotated "a" radians: [sin(a), cos(a)]

      • add

        public Vertex add(Vertex v)
        Parameters:
        v - Vertex to add
        Returns:
        A reference to itself (calling this method modifies the vertex)

      • add

        public static Vertex add(Vertex a,
         Vertex b)
        Parameters:
        a - First vertex
        b - Second vertex
        Returns:
        A reference to a new Vertex, equal to a.add(b) or b.add(a)

      • angle

        public double angle()
        Returns:
        The rotation angle of the vertex (over the X-axis)

      • clone

        public Vertex clone()
        Returns a new copy of the vertex
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • crossProduct

        public double crossProduct(Vertex v)
        Parameters:
        v - Second vertex of the cross product
        Returns:
        The cross product of this vertex with "v", please note that order is: this x v

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo(Vertex v)
        Parameters:
        v - Vertex point to compare with
        Returns:
        The distance between this vertex and "v"

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Returns:
        The X-axis coordinate of the vertex

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Returns:
        The Y-axis coordinate of the vertex

      • length

        public double length()
        Returns:
        The length of the vertex, also the distance to the origin

      • normal

        public Vertex normal()
        Returns:
        Returns the left perpendicular vertex: [-y, x]

      • opposite

        public Vertex opposite()
        Returns:
        Returns the opposite vertex: [-x, -y]

      • resize

        public Vertex resize(double s)
        Resizes the vertex to match the given length
        Parameters:
        s - The new length for the vertex
        Returns:
        A reference to the calling vertex

      • rotate

        public Vertex rotate(double a)
        Rotates the calling vertex the given angle
        Parameters:
        a - Angle in radians
        Returns:
        A reference to the calling vertex

      • scalar

        public double scalar(Vertex v)
        Parameters:
        v - Second vertex
        Returns:
        The scalar product of this vertex with the second one

      • scale

        public Vertex scale(double s)
        Scales the vector (for ex. scale(3) of [2,2] results in [6,6])
        Parameters:
        s - Scale factor
        Returns:
        A reference to the calling vertex

      • setX

        public void setX(double x)
        Sets a new value for the X-axis coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - New "x" value

      • setY

        public void setY(double y)
        Sets a new value for the Y-axis coordinate
        Parameters:
        y - New "y" value

      • sub

        public Vertex sub(Vertex v)
        Subtracts the given vertex to the calling vertex (result is "this - v")
        Parameters:
        v - Vertex to subtract
        Returns:
        A reference to itself (calling this method modifies the vertex)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • unit

        public Vertex unit()
        Returns:
        A new vertex, with length = 1, and the same orientation that the calling vertex
